name: GKLeaderboardSet
desc: Organizes leaderboards into logical and coherent groups.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The localized title for the leaderboard set.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the leaderboard set.

items.name: var groupIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the group that the leaderboard set belongs to.

items.name: func loadImage(completionHandler: ((UIImage?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads the localized image that you associate with the leaderboard set.

items.name: class func loadLeaderboardSets(completionHandler: (([GKLeaderboardSet]?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads all of the leaderboard sets you configure for your game.

items.name: func loadLeaderboards(handler: ([GKLeaderboard]?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads the leaderboards in the leaderboard set.
